briefTitle: An Extension Study of Duloxetine in Osteoarthritis and Knee Pain (Extension of F1J-JE-HMGX, NCT02248480)
officialTitle: An Open Label Extension Study of Phase 3 Trial of Duloxetine in Patients With Osteoarthritis and Knee Pain
summary: The purpose of this study is to assess the safety and efficacy of duloxetine in participants with osteoarthritis and knee pain. The study will last for 1 year.

primaryOutcome.measure: Percentage of Participants With Drug Related Adverse Events (AEs) or Any Serious Adverse Events (SAEs)
